meanings.definition: A hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex that regulates metabolism and immune response.
meanings.sent1: The adrenocorticosteroid helps control how our bodies use food and fight off sickness.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes prescribe adrenocorticosteroids to help patients with certain health conditions.
meanings.sent3: The adrenocorticosteroid decided to throw a party for the immune system to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: Her influence on metabolism was like that of an adrenocorticosteroid, speeding up processes.
meanings.sent5: The adrenocorticosteroid was the superhero of the body, fighting off invaders and keeping things in balance.

meanings.definition: A synthetic drug that mimics the effects of natural adrenocorticosteroids.
meanings.sent1: Athletes sometimes use adrenocorticosteroids to enhance their performance, but it's not safe.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an adrenocorticosteroid to help reduce inflammation in the patient's joints.
meanings.sent3: The adrenocorticosteroid costume at the party was a hit, everyone thought it was real!
meanings.sent4: Her energy after taking the synthetic adrenocorticosteroid was like a burst of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The adrenocorticosteroid pill was a tiny powerhouse, bringing relief and strength to the body.
